title: ICC t20 WC
content: Strong urges to dance and celebrate. Seniors please arrange World Cup celebrations inside the campus üôè.

comments.body: PES doesn't even allow Holi celebrations inside campus and you want world cup celebrations lmao
Idk how being a Pesticide + senior u still think ppl can do something like this in the campus
Lol that reminds of when  they did the screening for 2023 finals at ec campus and India lost ,from that day I  decided not to go to any public screening for an india match
At least a cheer out would give some vibes. Dude, mumbaikars are the luckiest species ü•≤
